message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize your industry. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, it's poised to significantly enhance efficiency and productivity. Given its exceptional capabilities, we're offering this opportunity for an exclusive price of $2000000.
Thank you for the detailed offer, Alice. We appreciate the value you've placed on your product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000.
